ovdesc.p: This application is used to create relationships between records held on the Customer application or the PERSON.ENTITY application.

desc.p: Unique ID of the CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP record
NNNNN is the julian day number
XXXXX is the unique sequential number
Identifies the key to CUSTOMER.REL.GROUP record to form a relation.
This field will contain the is of a CUSTOMER.REL.GROUP if applicable to the relationship.
Must be a Valid record on the CUSTOMER.REL.GROUP

This field is used when defining all the relationships within the group in one CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP record. This relationship defined here can be between T24 Customers, Persons or Entities. Allowing the definition of relationships with individuals or entities who are not customers of the bank.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
No input if the fields ORIG.RELATION or REL.RELATION are entered.
This field is used to define the CUSTOMER or PERSON.ENTITY record of the originating party.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Mandatory input if the field ORIG.PARTY is entered

p.p: If ORIG.PARTY is "Customer" must be a valid record on T24 Customer application
If ORIG.PARTY is "Person " must be a valid record on the PERSON.ENTITY application which has been classified as a PERSON record
If ORIG.PARTY is "ENTITY" must be a valid record on the PERSON.ENTITY application which has been classified as an ENTITY record

desc.p: This field is used to record the percentage of ownership OF originated customer
Valid percentage equal or less than 100%
This field is used when defining relationships between existing CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP records. It is used in conjunction with the field REL.RELATION.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a record on the CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP file.
No input allowed is the field ORIG.PARTY is used
This field is used to record the percentage of ownership in the relationship. For example an entity may be partially or wholly owned by another entity.
Valid percentage equal or less than 100%
This field is used to a reference number if required.
This field is used to state the effective date of the relationship
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER

This field is used when defining all the relationships within the group in one CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP record. The relationship defined here can be between T24 Customers, Persons or Entities. Allowing the definition of relationships with individuals or entities who are not customers of the bank. Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER. The fields REL.RELATION to OWNING.PER can be sub valued to define multiple relationships to one originating party (ORIG.PARTY)
No input if the fields ORIG.RELATION or REL.RELATION are entered.
This field is used to define the CUSTOMER or PERSON.ENTITY record of the relating party.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Mandatory input if the field REL.PARTY is entered

p.p: If REL.PARTY is "Customer" must be a valid record on T24 Customer application
If REL.PARTY is "Person " must be a valid record on the PERSON.ENTITY application which has been classified as a PERSON record
If REL.PARTY is "ENTITY" must be a valid record on the PERSON.ENTITY application which has been classified as an ENTITY record

desc.p: This field is used when defining relationships between existing CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP records. It is used in conjunction with the field ORIG.RELATION.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
No input allowed is the field ORIG.PARTY is used
Becomes mandatory input if the field ORIG.RELATION is entered
If input it must be a record on the CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP application
This field is used to define the relation between the originating party and the related party For example
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record on the RELATION table.
This field is used to define the branch responsible for maintaining the relationship with the originating party, where multi entities are involved.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record in the COMPANY table
This field is used to define the department responsible for maintaining the relationship with the originating party, where multi departments are involved.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record in the DEPT.ACCT.OFFICER table
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is reserved for future use
This field is used to define the role of the related relation
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record defined on the EB.ROLE application
An alternative code for easy means of referencing the customer relationship
Maximum of 5 alphanumeric chars is allowed
To state the purpose of the relationship between two or more customers defined in CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP record
Valid inputs are TAX, LIMIT or ADVICES or OTHERS or can be left blank
Customer to Customer - This is mainly financial in nature. For eg. Tax splits, Limit exposures, etc.
Customer to person/entity - This is mainly non-financial in nature. For eg. 'Advices' which is sent normally to the solicitor, accountant, etc.
To specify a reason for changing the relationship record some of the examples could be

This field is used to define how the originating party is related to underlying portfolio. For instance, a CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP can be attached to SEC.ACC.MASTER and this field would define how the original customer is related to the portfolio.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record in the RELATION table.
This field is used to define the role of the Original party with reference to the underlying portfolio to which it is attached.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record defined on the EB.ROLE application.
This field is used to define the branch responsible for maintaining the relationship between the originating party and portfolio, where multi entities are involved.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record in the COMPANY table.
This field is used to define the department responsible for maintaining the relationship between the originating party and portfolio, where multi departments are involved.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Must be a valid record in the DEPT.ACCT.OFFICER table.
This field is used to state the effective date from which there is a relationship between originating party and the underlying portfolio.
Forms part of a multi value set of fields from ORIG.PARTY to OWNING.PER
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
